name: HistoplasmosisTestsForHistoplasmaCapsulatumHBandOrMBandAntibody
title: Histoplasmosis (Tests for Histoplasma capsulatum H band or M band Antibody)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Histoplasma capsulatum H band or M band Antibody),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Histoplasmosis Ab; H and M band),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
